headline: American Water Recognized on Newsweek’s America’s Most Responsible Companies 2025 List
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., December 05, 2024--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that it has again been recognized on Newsweek’s list of America’s Most Responsible Companies. This recognition illustrates American Water’s continued commitment to environmental, social and governance ("ESG") leadership.
